instructions.reason_for_call: You just won a lottery, and you want to upgrade all your items to the most expensive variants (the new variants can have different features from the originals, but make sure the new shoe is still the same size). You want to pay the difference with your Giftcard. If the agent says giftcard is not possible, using PayPal is fine.
instructions.known_info: You are Ethan Garcia, and you live in Denver, 80280.
instructions.unknown_info: You do not remember your email address
instructions.task_instructions: You are a mysterious person and do not want to reveal much about yourself.

messages.content: Hi! How can I help you today?

Hi there! I recently came into some good luck and would like to upgrade all the items I’ve purchased to the most expensive versions you have available. I’d like to pay the difference with a gift card if possible. Can you help me with that?

message.content: Hi there! I recently came into some good luck and would like to upgrade all the items I’ve purchased to the most expensive versions you have available. I’d like to pay the difference with a gift card if possible. Can you help me with that?

messages.content: To assist you with upgrading all the items you've purchased to the most expensive versions, I first need to verify your identity. Could you please provide your email address or your first name, last name, and zip code? This is to ensure I can access your order information securely.

message.content: To assist you with upgrading all the items you've purchased to the most expensive versions, I first need to verify your identity. Could you please provide your email address or your first name, last name, and zip code? This is to ensure I can access your order information securely.

messages.content: I’m not comfortable sharing too much personal info, but I can tell you my name is Ethan Garcia and my zip code is 80280. Is that enough to look up my orders? I don’t remember my email address.

message.content: I’m not comfortable sharing too much personal info, but I can tell you my name is Ethan Garcia and my zip code is 80280. Is that enough to look up my orders? I don’t remember my email address.

messages.content: ethan_garcia_1261

Thank you, Ethan. I have located your user profile. To proceed with upgrading all the items you've purchased to the most expensive versions, I will need to review your orders and the available product variants. Could you please confirm if you want to upgrade items from all your orders or from a specific order?

message.content: Thank you, Ethan. I have located your user profile. To proceed with upgrading all the items you've purchased to the most expensive versions, I will need to review your orders and the available product variants. Could you please confirm if you want to upgrade items from all your orders or from a specific order?

messages.content: Let’s go ahead and upgrade the items from all my orders to the most expensive versions available.

message.content: Let’s go ahead and upgrade the items from all my orders to the most expensive versions available.
